gobblin.kafka.schemareg

Interface KafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - : the type of the schema identifier (e.g. int, string, md5, ...)
    S - : the type of the schema system in use (e.g. avro's Schema, ... )
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingKafkaSchemaRegistry, ConfigDrivenMd5SchemaRegistry, LiKafkaSchemaRegistry

    public interface KafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>
    An interface for a Kafka Schema Registry Classes implementing this interface will typically be constructed by a KafkaSchemaRegistryFactory and should have a constructor that takes a Properties object as a parameter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S getById(K id)
      Get a schema given an id
      S getLatestSchema(String name)
      Get the latest schema that was registered under this name
      boolean hasInternalCache()
      SchemaRegistry implementations that do not have an internal cache can set this to false and Gobblin will supplement such registries with a cache on top (if enabled).
      K register(String name, S schema)
      Register this schema under the provided name

      • hasInternalCache

        boolean hasInternalCache()
        SchemaRegistry implementations that do not have an internal cache can set this to false and Gobblin will supplement such registries with a cache on top (if enabled).
        Returns:
        whether this implementation of the schema registry has an internal cache
